description: Sid is a Pok√©mon Trainer that competed in the Battle Tower. He became very attracted to May and consistently flirted with her, but she didn`t share the same interest in him. When the clones of Deoxys (Purple-core) were abducting people, he sacrificed himself to save May and was taken instead. After being saved by the others, he assisted in restoring energy to the city with the help of his Blastoise.
name: Shouta
